title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 643.1 - Executory contracts as mortgages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 643.1 - Executory contracts as mortgages

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 250

An executory contract for the sale of real property or both
real and personal property under which the purchaser has or is entitled to
possession of the real property prior to the delivery of a deed constitutes a
mortgage as the term "mortgage" is defined at section
641.6
(a) of this Title, the recording of which is subject to the taxes described in Part
642 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
643.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
